message.body: Ok so I've already talked to auntie Raine and uncle joe is out in the woods but Chloe messed up her foot and I think it might be broken or like a stress fracture and she's in a lot of pain and I've given her tylenol and we're icing it right now and it's elevated and student health is closed and everything closed At 5 and so I don't know what else to do for her without going to the ER... Any suggestions?
What color is it?
What does her mom say?
Did she throw up?
Does student health tell you where to go in an emergency?
It's bruised a little around the big toe bone thing. She's talking to her mom right now... They say to give all ur moneys at the nearest Manhattan ER
Sounds like you're doing everything right. If she can make it through the night. What time do they open?
8am... But she has a biochemistry test at 9:30 and plans to go after.
Geez... How did she do it?
Um she decided last week that she was going to start going to the gym everyday. And she did. Twice most days. And yesterday she ran instead of walked the marathon for pancreatic cancer research
Did she fall? Impressive
No that's why I think it's a stress fracture... She just overdid everything.
Poor baby.
Ace bandage might help after ice?
Yeah but what if we bandage it wrong?
Google it
Yeah because people who listen to the internet end up real well.
Mayo clinic. Geez
Dude no. It's swelling too bad and she keeps having these panic attacks whenever she can feel the blood pulse. I'm not straight jacketing it.
Got it. Well you are the care giver. Do you need er?
I don't know!!! I just need the good ol Bluffton pm clinic!!!!
Call er nurse and ask what to do
K
ï¿¼
Glad to hear Chloe is resting. Who is carrying her to class?
We r in hotel
How is Chloe?

She just went to student Health. They gave her an ibuprofen and an ace bandage and said there's nothing they can do. But she can't walk and the bone is clearly not in the right place. Idk should she see a specialist?!
Is joe still in woods?
You can't mess with this. Can she get to afamily doc?
